<a id="VisualShaderNodeTexture3D"></a>

# VisualShaderNodeTexture3D

**Inherits:** [VisualShaderNodeSample3D](VisualShaderNodeSample3D.md) **\<** [VisualShaderNode](VisualShaderNode.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Performs a 3D texture lookup within the visual shader graph.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Performs a lookup operation on the provided texture, with support for multiple texture sources to choose from.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="VisualShaderNodeTexture3D_property_texture"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Texture3D](Texture3D.md) **texture** [ðŸ”—](#VisualShaderNodeTexture3D_property_texture)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_texture**\ (\ value\: [Texture3D](Texture3D.md)\ )
- [Texture3D](Texture3D.md) **get_texture**\ (\ )

A source texture. Used if [VisualShaderNodeSample3D.source](VisualShaderNodeSample3D.md#VisualShaderNodeSample3D_property_source) is set to [VisualShaderNodeSample3D.SOURCE_TEXTURE](VisualShaderNodeSample3D.md#VisualShaderNodeSample3D_constant_SOURCE_TEXTURE).
